review: We bought the entire bedroom suite, including 2 nightstands. They are very sturdy, attractive, and the drawers are very roomy. I would definitely recommend!
stylish and functional little piece of furniture next to the bed

review_title: Does not glide open and closed smoothly
review: The glides in this model aren't made of metal, they are plastic, so the drawers do not glide smoothly, which is what one wants with a dresser or storage. Its cheap and looks nice, but function is disappointing

I bought this a few months ago because I was looking for a bedside drawer. It works perfectly. The height is just right and the bottom drawer is large enough I can place my tablet and book inside without fear that it will not close.
Perfect addition to our set.
The drawers do not slide smoothly.
Brought this nightstand for my kid. Exactly what she needed to storage for extra accessories.
Drawers stick and fall apart.
Easy to build, looks nice. Using them as night stands and didn't have to spend a ton on them.

review_title: Great but a missing part out of the box!
review: It is a very good product for the price. But mine did not have one back cover out of two.
Bought this a few months ago. Easy to assemble! A lot bigger than you think—space wise.
I didn't realize it was so small. But it is priced better than the Malm dresser, which is the furniture line I used in my bedroom.
I’m happy with this purchase,it fit perfectly where I put it.
I bought this on clearance, and wish I had got a few more. Good quality, east to assemble and a great price.

review_title: I bought this to use as a night stand in place of the one I needed to get rid of. It does the job just fine and I didn't have to pay $$$$$ for it!
review: Yes
not to happy with this product.

review_title: Exteremly underwhelming. I’m giving this a 2 because it is ridiculously tiny.
review: No
Compact, sturdt, functional and a good match to my bedroom

review_title: Smaller than I thought but good for the money
review: I bought this a couple months ago and it is definitely smaller than I planned on but decent quality for the price!

It looked good, and I bought this a month ago, but returned it due to missing parts- the item I purchased was white on the panel of the lower bottom drawer, when it was supposed to be one color only (Black-brown after assembly)
